name: Finsterforst
description:
'''Finsterforst''' is a German [[folk metal]] band from [[Schwarzwald]], [[Baden-Württemberg]], whose lyrical themes deal with nature, [[German myths]], and fantasy worlds. Formed in 2004, the group has released five [[studio album]]s, one [[extended play]] and one [[compilation album]].

Finsterforst means "dark forest" and it is a reference to "[[Schwarzwald]]" ("black forest"), a wooded mountain range in the band's home state.

Besides the usual line-up of instruments used in metal ([[electric guitar]]s, [[Bass (guitar)|bass]], [[drum]]s), the band's sound relies heavily on [[accordion]] melodies, with the occasional use of instruments such as the [[tin whistle]] and the [[oboe]]. The band's genre is often dubbed [[pagan metal]] because of its use of harsh vocals.

Several Finsterforst members also play in Cryptic Forest, a [[black metal|black-metal]] band from [[Schwarzwald]], [[Baden-Württemberg]].
